roleset.name: display in a picture
roleset.note: PICTURE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'picture' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from picture.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: picture-v
example.text: Although their ads picture curvy young people in skimpy outfits, club owners know the future lies with the lumpier over-40 set.
example.arg: curvy young people in skimpy outfits

roleset.name: photograph
roleset.note: TAKE_PICTURE-L NOTES: Added by Julia. Comparison to photograph.01. Erroneously included in picture.01, previous to 1/12/17.

example.name: take_picture-l
example.text: Her parents took her picture everyday since she was born â€” watch her grow up before your eyes.
